Eric Schmidt also says he will act as an advisor to Page and co-founder Sergey Brin .`` As Google has grown, managing the business has become more complicated,'' Eric Schmidt said on Thursday. So Larry, Sergey Brin and I have been talking for a long time about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making-- and over the holidays we decided now was the right moment to make some changes to the way we are structured. No longer will the company be run by the`` triumvirate'' of Eric Schmidt as leader with Page and Sergey Brin as presidents. Eric Schmidt said Page, who was the company's founding CEO, is now ready

Before joining Google a decade ago, Eric Schmidt served as an exec at computer networking maker Novell( NOVL) and Sun Microsystems, which is now owned by Oracle( ORCL). My estimate is that Eric Schmidt likes to be in the game. He likes to be a player, said Roger Kay . It's unlikely Eric Schmidt will retire with his billions, taking up sailing or traveling. Indeed, there's a rumor he's trying to land a gig on cable television.
